wm-license-cc-by-sa-3.0-text: Dem license dis file under di [[{{int:wm-license-cc-wiki-link}}|Creative Commons]] [https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/deed.en Attribution-Share Alike 3.0 Unported] license.
wm-license-cc-free-to-share-text: to kopi, distribut an transmit di wok
wm-license-cc-conditions-attribution-tex: Mek you give beta credit, give link for di license, an mek you show di chenj-dem wey you mek. You fit stil do am how you like am, but no do am like sey di pesin wey get di license gree mek you use am.
wm-license-cc-conditions-share_alike-tex: If you remix, transform, or build ontop di material, mek sure sey you share your kontribushon-dem onda di [https://creativecommons.org/share-your-work/licensing-considerations/compatible-licenses same or compatible license] as di original.
